name: RepositoryViewr
description: A react application that will give an overview of any repository. An interactive table and chart views to help users understand what happens on each commit.
libraries: Language: Javascript. Libraries: D3, React, Semantic UI, Github REST, Chart.js

name: PassChecker
description: A react application made for checking password strength, comparing passwords, tips and guidelines for creating passwords and generating new ones.

name: Animated Signatures
description: A react application which is an interactive signature builder.

name: TicTacToe Framework
description: A client-server architecture using WebSockets to host multiple different rooms of tictactoe. Uses Pixijs to add lighting uses WebGL to represent the game.
libraries: Language: JavaScript. Libraries: React, Pixi,js, Socket.io

name: Color Lab
description: A puzzle game that tests the player's ability to mix subtractive and additive colors, as well color harmonies.

name: Weather Owl
description: An application that allow ones to check the weather as well an analyze the weather situation.
